title: Daomu Biji: A Thousand Faces - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secrets
author: Nan Pai San Shu   Xu Lei   南派三叔
description: There is an amazing industry around me that focuses on masks. I have long been interested in this mask industry, so I will do in-depth data collection and gather a thousand stories associated with masks. Some will relate to human skin masks and some will relate to dirty faces. I’ll collectively call them — A Thousand Faces.>
